name: Advisor Performance
description: This dashboard displays the performance of financial advisors, focusing on key metrics such as assets under management, number of assets and clients, pipeline duration, and time spent in each stage of the client onboarding process.

kpis.name: Assets Under Management
kpis.description: Total assets under management for Bernelle Weatherhead, amounting to £6.2M.

kpis.name: Number of Assets
kpis.description: The total number of assets managed by Bernelle Weatherhead is 18.

kpis.name: Average Pipeline Duration
kpis.description: The average time an asset spends in the pipeline for Bernelle Weatherhead is 39 days.

kpis.name: Average Time in Stage
kpis.description: The average time spent in each stage of the client onboarding process for Bernelle Weatherhead is 7.5 days.

kpis.name: SLA Completion
kpis.description: The Service Level Agreement (SLA) completion rate is 84.6%, with 15.4% incomplete.
